label: ABC_hP6_194_a_b_c-001
title: SrCoO
comments:
We found this in the ICSD while looking for compounds in the \href{current_web_home_dir/ABC_hP6_194_c_d_a-001}{LiBC structure}.  This is the only ICSD report of a compound occupying the first three Wyckoff positions of space group $P6_{3}/mmc$ \#194. 
 (Gaoke, 2006) refer to this as SrCoO$_{x}$, but the reported structure is stochiometric SrCoO. The Co-O distance is only 1.05{\AA}, so this structure may not be entirely correct.
